datasourcespec.name: World Weather Online
datasourcespec.description: Provides current weather conditions and next 5 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast

queryparam.description: US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree), or City Name
Specify today, tomorrow or a date in future. The date should be in the yyyy-mm-dd format. e.g: today or tomorrow or 2013-04-21
Possible values are localObsTime, isDayTime, utcDateTime. Two or more values can be passed as comma separated
